posts.postText: If you set the high score, you get an extra 50 points? :D
I'm actually going to implement this sometime soon. I have other things to work on, but it should be done sometime soon.

This, I like. It would so make people play on the server a bit longer, for the whole incentive of not only being the best time, but getting rewarded for it... though, when new maps get added, there is an easy 50 points to whoever gets in the map first... unless they be slow (hint hint, me).
You now receive 50 points for getting the fastest time and 25 points for cleanest run.
